statements: DELETE FROM court_cases WHERE case_id = 10 AND case_name = 'Sample Case';
DELETE FROM court_cases WHERE deadline_date < '2022-06-30' AND case_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM case_parties WHERE party_id = 1 AND party_type='Plaintiff';
DELETE FROM court_cases WHERE case_id = 100 AND deadline < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM lawyers WHERE lawyer_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM case_documents WHERE uploaded_by = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM lawyer WHERE specialty = 'Criminal Defense';
DELETE FROM case_file WHERE file_type = 'legal document';
DELETE FROM law_firm WHERE law_firm_name = 'Smith & Associates';
